Author: Callum Carmicheal
Name: The Great Controller Hud Switcher
Punchline: Toggle controller / mouse mode automatically or with /controller | /mouse | /togglemkcontroller
Description: /controllerhudcfg | A simple tool to automatically switch between keyboard and controller hud's when pressing WASD or moving the left joystick. You can setup a macro to add the actions to your hotbat with the commands: /controller, /kbm, /togglecontroller
